    直接已知子类:
    AccountSelectionPopup

    public class TabbedSelectionWindow
extends PopupWindow
    Generic component for a popup window that allows to display multiple selection tabs on the left, and displays configured components matching those the selection on the right. Note: For best visual results, the components on the right should be of fixed size, since the window width and heigh is calculated based on these components
    作者:
    Frederik Heremans, Joram Barrez
    另请参阅:

      • addSelectionItem

        public void addSelectionItem(com.vaadin.ui.Embedded icon,
                             String name,
                             com.vaadin.ui.Component component,
                             com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener clickListener)
        参数:
        icon - The 16x16 icon that will be displayed on the left in the selection table.
        name - The name that will be shown in the selection table
        component - The component that is selected when the item in the selection table is clicked.
        clickListener - The listener that will be attached to the OK button displayed beneath the component.
